name: Boulmajix
description:
Boulmajix is a 1 vs 1 game created during a "private game jam" in 48h.

We had to create a platformer that was a multiplayer game while only having the spacebar and the mouse to control your character.

My girlfriend helped me with some of the sprites and all the music used are on my soundcloud: https://soundcloud.com/ectomorphe_1.

Still has some collisions bugs with corners and the overall game is kinda janky.
